resources.string: 2. Leave the place cleaner than you found it.
3. You are permitted to use Google.
5. After finding the first location, the second one is within a walkable distance.
6. You can only travel by walking, riding a bike, swimming, or skateboarding. If you are caught flying, you will automatically lose.
7. Upon winning, there may or may not be a pop quiz at the very end to test if you have read all of the rules.
8. You cannot share the contents of this game with anyone.
9. There is technically more than one correct answer to each clue. But that is not my answer. Therefore, while technically correct, it can still be wrong.
10. Take a photo as proof, or it didn\'t happen.
11. The last rule is that there is always an exception. So, go pick one of the rules from above and simply break it!
Look respectfully, do not tap the glass.

The Monterey Bay Aquarium is not only a popular tourist destination but also a leader in ocean conservation and marine research. It plays a crucial role in educating the public about marine life and the importance of preserving ocean ecosystems.
You can\'t teach an old dog new tricks, but you can teach them to climb!
Located in the city known for its golden attraction.

Dogpatch Boulders is a premier indoor climbing gym nestled in San Francisco\'s vibrant Dogpatch neighborhood, offering over 10,000 square feet of diverse climbing terrain for all skill levels. With state-of-the-art facilities, including training areas and yoga studios, and a vibrant community atmosphere, it\'s the perfect place for climbers to challenge themselves, connect with others, and embrace the thrill of the sport.
Hmm, that\'s not it. Try again!
You completed the treasure hunt and have become one with nature.
